text: 11.6 Lom 4.4-5, Gal 3.18 Yaw, God ne kɨlop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gɨl, kɨlop anɨgɨl aglup. Kɨli wog gɨtep gɨpal agɨl kɨlop ma aglup. God binɨb wog gɨpal ak nɨŋɨd kɨlop aglek nɨm, kɨli agɨnɨgel, God chɨnop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep ma gup agɨnɨgel tek lup. Ne wog chɨn nep nɨŋɨd, chɨnop aglup agɨnɨgel. Pen anɨgɨl ma mɨdeb. God ne binɨb okok kɨlop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gɨl, aglup.
